column1: 24166,Immortal Iron Fist (2006) #26,26,21864,90,"Danny's escape from Hell gets down to the wire! Trapped in the mystical and secret eighth city of monsters, Danny and the Immortal Weapons have to make the prison-break of a lifetime...with Davos waiting to meet them outside! But will he help them run...or shove them back to their deaths?! By Duane Swierczynski (CABLE) and Travel Foreman (ARES)! Rated T  ...$2.99","
